General.Name: Hoang Anh Gia Lai JSC
General.Description: Hoang Anh Gia Lai Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agriculture business in Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, and internationally. The company operates through Manufacturing, Trading and Services, Construction, and Agriculture segments. It is involved in the management of investments; trading in materials, and machinery and equipment for cultivation and animal husbandry sectors; mechanical activities; gas and hotel business; growing and trading of fruits and other crops; raising and trading of pigs and cows; production and sale of seedlings; and sports and recreational activities. The company also engages in the planting and development of rubber and palm oil plantations; and planting and harvesting fruit trees. In addition, it is involved in the asset management activities; purchase and sale of goods; and construction of building brans activities. Further, the company produces and sells fertilizers, plastic pipes, and other tools and tools used in agriculture. Hoang Anh Gia Lai Joint Stock Company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Pleiku, Vietnam.
